attributes.action: Keep schools closed in January 2021 to protect against the new strain (COVID-19)
attributes.additional_details: Teacher and pupils are at greater risk with this new strain of Covid. With no vaccine promised to teacher it is essential that they are protect so that they are able to educate virtually from the safety of their homes. Children also pose a risk to their families and the vulnerable if they are to return to school in January 2021
attributes.background: With the rising cases and new strain it is essential that schools remain closed and instead resort to online learning.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

The latest guidance on schools returning in January is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021
